title: Fractal Shares Fall in Mumbai Debut After $313 Million India IPO
description: Fractal Analytics Ltd. shares fell in their Mumbai trading debut on Monday, signaling continued weakness in investor appetite for technology startups amid valuation concerns in an otherwise subdued stock market.

title: Telkom Indonesia Is Said to Revive Plan for Data Center Stake Sale
description: PT Telkom Indonesia is reviving a plan to sell a stake in its data center business to tap rising interest in digital infrastructure assets, according to people familiar with the matter.

title: Blackstone to Lead $600 Million Investment in AI Firm Neysa
description: A group of investors led by Blackstone Inc. plans to make an equity investment of up to $600 million in Indian artificial intelligence cloud startup Neysa.
